properties.areaDesc: Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 2:54AM EST until February 6 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 15 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt. Seas 5 to 7 feet, with occasional seas
up to 9 feet. For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 knots,
with frequent gusts to gale force, becoming west southwest 30
to 35 knots after midnight with higher gusts. Seas 7 to 12 feet,
with occasional seas up to 15 feet.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 AM this morning to 3 PM
EST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 AM EST this
morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM EST FRIDAY
